code: public void restartRemote(int port) throws InterruptedException {     if (this.remoteProcessRestarter != null) {         stop(this.remoteProcess).         this.remoteProcess = this.remoteProcessRestarter.apply(port, this.classesDirectory).     } }
void stop() throws InterruptedException {     stop(this.localProcess).     stop(this.remoteProcess). }
private void stop(Process process) throws InterruptedException {     if (process != null) {         process.destroy().         process.waitFor().     } }
